name: Hiroi Kikuri 廣井 きくり (Bocchi the Rock!)
description:
Made my own LORA model of the drunkard from Bocchi the Rock!

The prompts I used to get her original style:

dark pink hair, magenta eyes or closed eyes, braided ponytail, ribbon, strap slip, bangs, long green dress, bare shoulders, earrings

You can add Sharp teeth if you want.
